product_name: Wilderness Press Mount Shasta Wilderness Recreation Map - 3rd Edition
long_description: This color topographic map shows all the trails and climbing routes on Mt. Shasta, including difficulty rating for climbing routes. Also includes driving directions, history, regulations and safety tips. Printed on water-resistant paper. Companion map to ''The Mt. Shasta Book''. Wilderness Press; copyright 2005. Scale 1:38,000; contour interval 100 feet. Measures 36 x 21 inches; folded 7.5 x 4.25 inches.
short_description: This color topographic map shows all the trails and climbing routes on Mt. Shasta, including difficulty rating for climbing routes.
